SEARCH
Package util

Class MedicalRecordManager

java.lang.Object
util.MedicalRecordManager
public class MedicalRecordManager extends Object
Manages the creation, retrieval, and persistence of medical records, diagnoses, and treatments. This singleton class provides centralized management for:
  • Loading and saving medical record data, including diagnoses and treatments.
  • Retrieving and updating patient information.
  • Adding new diagnoses and treatments to medical records.
The data is stored in three CSV files:
  • MedicalRecords.csv for basic patient information.
  • Diagnoses.csv for patient diagnoses.
  • Treatments.csv for patient treatments.

    • getMedicalRecord

      public MedicalRecord getMedicalRecord(String patientId)
      Retrieves a medical record for a specific patient.
      Parameters:
      patientId - The unique identifier of the patient.
      Returns:
      The MedicalRecord object for the given patient, or null if not found.

    • updateContactInfo

      public boolean updateContactInfo(String patientId, String phoneNumber, String email)
      Updates the contact information (phone number and email) for a specific patient.
      Parameters:
      patientId - The unique identifier of the patient.
      phoneNumber - The new phone number to update.
      email - The new email address to update.
      Returns:
      true if the contact information was successfully updated, false if the patient record was not found.

    • addDiagnosis

      public boolean addDiagnosis(String patientId, Diagnosis diagnosis)
      Adds a new diagnosis to a specific patient's medical record.
      Parameters:
      patientId - The unique identifier of the patient.
      diagnosis - The Diagnosis object to add to the patient's record.
      Returns:
      true if the diagnosis was successfully added, false if the patient record was not found.

      Returns:
